title: Heaven Above
description: Suddenly a burst of light drew Erin's attention to the other side of the room, where what looked like particles of shimmering dust gathered and materialized into a surrealistic female figure. Its features sharpened and solidified before her eyes, slowly but surely, forming the substance of a woman. Glenna... Glenna and Blake Tanner were eagerly awaiting the surrogate birth of their first child when Glenna met an untimely demise. As Blake plunged into a world of grief, Glenna's spirit vowed to see him happy once again. And the determined ghost had a plan: She would give Blake a second chance at finding love and having a family. For Glenna had set her sights on a new wife for Blake: Erin Winters, the surrogate mother who carried his child...It is a story of unselfish love eloquently told. Glenna Tanner dies before the surrogate birth of her first child. Her husband Blake is so grief-stricken that he no longer wants the baby. But Glenna's spirit returns to bring Blake and the surrogate mother, Erin Winters, together.
author: Sara Jarrod
